AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Lockdown which allows for an instant lockdown of a server in the event of a raid.
[p]lockdown to see commands. No additional requirements needed.
Please ensure you have set the bot's mod and admin roles via [p]set modrole and [p]set adminrole. For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: Lockdown
SHORT: Cog for locking down channels in the event of a raid
DESCRIPTION: Locks down all channels in a server to allow for easier cleanup
